0.user_question: George had 30 dollars. For his birthday he got 16 more dollars but spent 38 on a new game. How much money does he have now?

ost_step.1: Identify the initial amount of money. The problem states George had 30 dollars.
ost_step.2: Add the amount of money he received for his birthday. He received 16 dollars.
ost_step.3: Subtract the amount of money he spent on the new game from the sum of the initial amount and the money he received.
ost_step.4: Therefore, George has 30 dollars (initial amount) + 16 dollars (birthday money) - 38 dollars (spent on new game) = 12 dollars.
